author: bodewig
msg: hint at namespace declaration rules.  PR 52309

author: koji
msg: SOLR-2346: Add a chance to set content encoding explicitly via content type of stream.

author: esammer
msg: - Added open / close methods to WALReader interface to be consistent with writer.
- Updated the default event limit for AvroWALWriter to 100k instead of 100.

author: esammer
msg: - Updated WALIndex to support a read and write index.
- Rewrote AvroWALReader to use WALIndex, support multiple WAL files as produced by AvroWALWriter
and to deal with various corner cases. Works.
